content.text: Hey! I'm really sad because my best friend just moved away.
Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how you feel. My best friend moved away a few years ago and I still miss her.
Yeah, it's really hard. I don't know what to do without her.
I know it's hard, but you'll get through this. Just remember that you have other friends and family who love you.
Thanks, I appreciate that. It's just hard to imagine my life without her.
I know it is. But it's okay to be sad. Just let yourself grieve and eventually you'll start to feel better.
I hope so. Thanks for listening.
No problem. I'm always here for you.
You're welcome. I'm glad I could help.
Me too. I'm feeling a little better now.
That's good to hear. Just remember, you're not alone.
No problem. Have a good day.
